ingredients.ingredient: 4 (6 ounce) russet potatoes, scrubbed and dried
4 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Use chopsticks placed on either side of the potato while slicing to prevent cutting all the way through
Slice potatoes thinly and evenly so they cook uniformly in the air fryer
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These elegant potatoes use an air fryer for a healthier version. Slice thinly using chopsticks as guides, brush with olive oil, season, and cook until crispy and tender.
